definition: an implement consisting of soft material mounted on a block, to add a buffer to a solution
details:
noun
- an implement consisting of soft material mounted on a block
= synonyms: buff
- a cushion-like device that reduces shock due to an impact
= synonyms: fender
- a power tool used to buff surfaces
= synonyms: polisher
- (computer science) a part of RAM used for temporary storage of data that is waiting to be sent to a device
= synonyms: buffer storage, buffer store
- an inclined metal frame at the front of a locomotive to clear the track
= synonyms: fender, cowcatcher, pilot
- a neutral zone between two rival powers that is created in order to diminish the danger of conflict
= synonyms: buffer zone
- (chemistry) an ionic compound that resists changes in its pH
verb
- to add a buffer to a solution
= example: to add a buffer to a solution
- to protect from impact
= example: to protect from impact
= synonyms: cushion, soften
